channel.title: Render crash?
channel.description:
I was in the process of making a render with Carrara 5 Pro. I was just curious of the cpu and I was amazed at what happens
[img]http://dugg.no-ip.biz/render.PNG[/img]
I was amazed the CPU barley change >_>
Oh, and I was rendering a background for a Server Console, or shall I say animation? After I get the render in .avi I just convert avi to avi H264 then convert the new avi H264 to gif Then i can layout the gif as a background layer JPannel

item.title: Render crash?
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Is that a quad core?
Where does the rendering part chime in, it looks like it goes down for the most part.

Are you rendering with all four passes you have available?

Read full topic

item.description:

I was in the process of making a render with Carrara 5 Pro.
I was just curious of the cpu and I was amazed at what happens

Oh, and I was rendering a background for a Server Console, or shall I say animation?
